topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5590e5b563687266e3000130#post_5590e5b563687266e3000130
That thing has been declining since 2004 or something.

I remember when Meridell was released and there was a Darigan vs Meridell War which Darigan won by a stroke of fate. Meridell was initially in the lead until the later quarter of the war when some of the highest level players defected to Darigan.

Neoquest and Neoquest 2 were tedious but interesting game.
